job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you an exceptional engineer eager to take charge, drive strategic influence, and conquer intricate technical challenges? Join us to develop pivotal product features while steering its technical trajectory, ensuring enduring stability and growth. Your technical choices will significantly influence both the product and its users, granting you the freedom to innovate and a duty to excel.

   You'll work on cutting-edge educational products:
     * TeachTap: Harnesses AI to animate historical figures in a dynamic, TikTok-inspired learning format.
     * TeachTales: Captivates students through personalized, enchanting storytelling that enhances understanding.
     * TimeBack: Functions as a learning assistant, seamlessly integrating with existing applications to provide proactive student coaching.
     * Athena: Delivers quantifiable academic results through AI-generated videos and tests.

   Your role involves guiding the technical progression of our products, ensuring they remain scalable, maintainable, and robust for the future. By working closely with product teams, you'll convert broad requirements into technical design decisions, tackling complex challenges while upholding high standards. Your choices will define the product's future and influence the educational paths of countless students.

   We emphasize strategic planning and initial design. Our AI-centric approach automates repetitive tasks, allowing you to concentrate on impactful decisions and problem-solving. Enjoy substantial autonomy and the opportunity to shape product direction, emphasizing long-term stability and scalability.

   If you're poised to lead the technical advancement of our SaaS offerings and utilize generative AI to explore new horizons, we invite you to connect with us.

   What you will be doing

     * Feature Development: Crafting and executing new features with a focus on scalability, maintainability, and long-term impact.
     * Requirement Engineering: Partnering with the product team to fine-tune requirements and spearheading technical discussions to align features with product objectives.
     * Operations and Maintenance: Ensuring product stability through monitoring, performance tuning, and proactive issue identification and resolution.
     * Technical Design: Making critical technical decisions that directly affect user experiences and the scalability of the product.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Jumping from one short-term project to another or pursuing the latest technology fad.
     * Working on internal IT systems or outsourced projects without tangible user impact.
     * Being bogged down by endless meetings or tedious infrastructure concerns.
job_details.full_text:
Lead Product Engineer, LearnwithAI (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Are you an exceptional engineer eager to take charge, drive strategic influence, and conquer intricate technical challenges? Join us to develop pivotal product features while steering its technical trajectory, ensuring enduring stability and growth. Your technical choices will significantly influence both the product and its users, granting you the freedom to innovate and a duty to excel.

   You'll work on cutting-edge educational products:
     * TeachTap: Harnesses AI to animate historical figures in a dynamic, TikTok-inspired learning format.
     * TeachTales: Captivates students through personalized, enchanting storytelling that enhances understanding.
     * TimeBack: Functions as a learning assistant, seamlessly integrating with existing applications to provide proactive student coaching.
     * Athena: Delivers quantifiable academic results through AI-generated videos and tests.

   Your role involves guiding the technical progression of our products, ensuring they remain scalable, maintainable, and robust for the future. By working closely with product teams, you'll convert broad requirements into technical design decisions, tackling complex challenges while upholding high standards. Your choices will define the product's future and influence the educational paths of countless students.

   We emphasize strategic planning and initial design. Our AI-centric approach automates repetitive tasks, allowing you to concentrate on impactful decisions and problem-solving. Enjoy substantial autonomy and the opportunity to shape product direction, emphasizing long-term stability and scalability.

   If you're poised to lead the technical advancement of our SaaS offerings and utilize generative AI to explore new horizons, we invite you to connect with us.

   What you will be doing

     * Feature Development: Crafting and executing new features with a focus on scalability, maintainability, and long-term impact.
     * Requirement Engineering: Partnering with the product team to fine-tune requirements and spearheading technical discussions to align features with product objectives.
     * Operations and Maintenance: Ensuring product stability through monitoring, performance tuning, and proactive issue identification and resolution.
     * Technical Design: Making critical technical decisions that directly affect user experiences and the scalability of the product.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Jumping from one short-term project to another or pursuing the latest technology fad.
     * Working on internal IT systems or outsourced projects without tangible user impact.
     * Being bogged down by endless meetings or tedious infrastructure concerns.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes developing user-facing applications powered by generative AI, specifically mentioning products like TeachTap (animating historical figures with AI) and TeachTales (personalized storytelling). The core responsibilities involve feature development, technical design, and operations for these AI-centric educational products, aligning with the definition of a GenAI Engineer.

Your technical choices will significantly influence both the product and its users
guiding the technical progression of our products

Your choices will define the product's future and influence the educational paths of countless students

job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the need to understand business goals, translate them into technical strategies, and make decisions that impact the product's direction and user experience, demonstrating a strong grasp of business context.

job_tasks.justification: The job description explicitly mentions the use of AI for animation, storytelling, coaching, and generating content (videos, tests), which are core applications of generative AI models. The phrase 'utilize generative AI' directly points to this category.

ensuring enduring stability and growth

lead the technical advancement of our SaaS offerings
job_tasks.justification: The role involves developing product features, ensuring scalability and maintainability, and making technical decisions that impact user experience, which are fundamental software development responsibilities, especially when building applications around AI.

job_tasks.justification: The emphasis on 'enduring stability and growth,' 'scalable, maintainable, and robust,' and specific mentions of 'monitoring, performance tuning, and proactive issue identification and resolution' directly relate to the operational aspects of keeping AI-powered products running smoothly in production.
